theorem
fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 17.2"
shows  "floor x + floor (-x) = -1"
a_0.formal solution:

 Evaluate $\lfloor17.2\rfloor+\lfloor-17.2\rfloor$. The final Answer is -1
 ### Proof
 The greatest integer less than $17.2$ is $17$, and the greatest integer less than $-17.2$ is $-18$, so our answer is $\boxed{-1}$.
 *)

fixes x :: real
assumes h0 : "x = 17.2"
shows  "floor x + floor (-x) = -1"
 proof- 
  show ?thesis sledgehammer
